definition: Bulgaria/Bulgarian/abbr. for 保加利亞|保加利亚[Bao3 jia1 li4 ya4]
to defend/to protect/to keep/to guarantee/to ensure/civil administration unit in the baojia 保甲[bao3 jia3] system (old)

sentences.english: The Comforter is the Holy Ghost.
Christ would ascend to heaven, and pray the Father to send the Comforter, the Holy Spirit.
sentences.chinese: 耶穌升上高天，求天父上帝，賜下聖靈保惠師。

sentences.english: He knows the gravity of the Comforter's coming.
sentences.chinese: 他知道保惠師的來到是多麼的重要。
